message.content:
We must first identify the “Depreciation” transactions. In this data set there is one such entry:

• The row with id “Depreciation20240101001” shows a depreciation posting of 45,742.50 (both amount and recorded_amount).

Since there is no depreciation record prior to this posting, we assume that the accumulated depreciation had an initial balance of 0.00. Once the depreciation posting takes place, the accumulated depreciation balance becomes 45,742.50.

Thus the answers are:

Accumulated Depreciation Initial Value: 0.00  
Accumulated Depreciation End Value: 45742.50

Below is the answer in the requested JSON format.

-----------------------------------------------------

{"solution": {"Accumulated Depreciation Initial Value": "0.00", "Accumulated Depreciation End Value": "45742.50"}}
